request.description: Create authentication token with user name and password. The return token is use as Authorization request header (Bearer {token}) for subsequent api/v1/auth call
Update authentication token with client, role, organization and warehouse value. A new token is return for use as Authozation request header (Bearer {token}) for other api call.
